bug.author: Habitats
bug.summary: DataSet.merge(...) sometimes result in illegal index
bug.description: I'm trying to implement my own DataSetIterator, but without luck. The error seems to be related to variable (RNN) -- perhaps best explained by simply running this self-contained gist, which will reproduce my exception: <denchmark-link:https://gist.github.com/Habitats/99d69588475b537034ea>https://gist.github.com/Habitats/99d69588475b537034ea</denchmark-link>

comments.comment: This thread has been automatically locked since there has not been any recent activity after it was closed. Please open a new issue for related bugs.
